segment.source: What's New in App-V 5.0
segment.target: What's New in App-V 5.0

segment.source: What's New in App-V 5.0
segment.target: What's New in App-V 5.0

segment.source: What's New in App-V 5.0
segment.target: What's New in App-V 5.0

segment.source: This section is for users who are already familiar with App-V and want to know what has changed in App-V 5.0 If you are not already familiar with App-V, you should start by reading Planning for App-V 5.0.
segment.target: This section is for users who are already familiar with App-V and want to know what has changed in App-V 5.0 If you are not already familiar with App-V, you should start by reading Planning for App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Changes in Standard Functionality
segment.target: Changes in Standard Functionality

segment.source: The following sections contain information about the changes in standard functionality for App-V 5.0.
segment.target: The following sections contain information about the changes in standard functionality for App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Changes to Supported Operating Systems
segment.target: Changes to Supported Operating Systems

segment.source: For more information, see App-V 5.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: For more information, see App-V 5.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: Changes to the sequencer
segment.target: Changes to the sequencer

segment.source: The following sections contain information about the changes in the App-V 5.0 sequencer.
segment.target: The following sections contain information about the changes in the App-V 5.0 sequencer.

segment.source: Specific change to the sequencer
segment.target: Specific change to the sequencer

segment.source: The following table displays information about what has changed with the App-V 5.0 sequencer
segment.target: The following table displays information about what has changed with the App-V 5.0 sequencer

segment.source: Sequencer Feature
segment.target: Sequencer Feature

segment.source: App-V 5.0 Sequencer Functionality
segment.target: App-V 5.0 Sequencer Functionality

segment.source: Reboot processing
segment.target: Reboot processing

segment.source: When an application prompts for a restart, you should allow the application to restart the computer running the sequencer.
segment.target: When an application prompts for a restart, you should allow the application to restart the computer running the sequencer.

segment.source: The computer running the sequencer will restart and the sequencer will resume in monitoring mode.
segment.target: The computer running the sequencer will restart and the sequencer will resume in monitoring mode.

segment.source: Specifying the virtual application directory
segment.target: Specifying the virtual application directory

segment.source: Virtual Application Directory is a mandatory parameter.
segment.target: Virtual Application Directory is a mandatory parameter.

segment.source: For best results, it should match the installation directory of the application installer.
segment.target: For best results, it should match the installation directory of the application installer.

segment.source: This results in more optimal performance and application compatibility.
segment.target: This results in more optimal performance and application compatibility.

segment.source: Editing shortcuts/FTAs
segment.target: Editing shortcuts/FTAs

segment.source: The Shortcuts/FTA page is on the Advanced editing page after the sequencing wizard has completed.
segment.target: The Shortcuts/FTA page is on the Advanced editing page after the sequencing wizard has completed.

segment.source: Change History Tab
segment.target: Change History Tab

segment.source: The Change History tab has been removed for App-V 5.0.
segment.target: The Change History tab has been removed for App-V 5.0.

segment.source: OSD Tab
segment.target: OSD Tab

segment.source: The OSD tab has been removed for App-V 5.0.
segment.target: The OSD tab has been removed for App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Virtual Services Tab
segment.target: Virtual Services Tab

segment.source: The virtual services tab has been removed for App-V 5.0.
segment.target: The virtual services tab has been removed for App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Files/Virtual File System Tab
segment.target: Files/Virtual File System Tab

segment.source: These tabs are combined and allow you to modify package files.
segment.target: These tabs are combined and allow you to modify package files.

segment.source: Deployment Tab
segment.target: Deployment Tab

segment.source: There are no longer options to configure the server URL in the packages.
segment.target: There are no longer options to configure the server URL in the packages.

segment.source: You should configure this now using deployment configuration, or the management server.
segment.target: You should configure this now using deployment configuration, or the management server.

segment.source: Package Converter Tool
segment.target: Package Converter Tool

segment.source: You can now use PowerShell to convert packages created in previous versions.
segment.target: You can now use PowerShell to convert packages created in previous versions.

segment.source: Add-on/Middleware
segment.target: Add-on/Middleware

segment.source: You can expand parent packages when you are sequencing an Add-On or Middleware application.
segment.target: You can expand parent packages when you are sequencing an Add-On or Middleware application.

segment.source: Add-ons and Middleware packages must be connected using connection groups in App-V 5.0.
segment.target: Add-ons and Middleware packages must be connected using connection groups in App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Files output
segment.target: Files output

segment.source: The following files are created with App-V 5.0, Windows Installer (.msi), .appv, deployment configuration, user configuration, and the Report.XML.
segment.target: The following files are created with App-V 5.0, Windows Installer (.msi), .appv, deployment configuration, user configuration, and the Report.XML.

segment.source: Compression/Security descriptors/MSI packages
segment.target: Compression/Security descriptors/MSI packages

segment.source: Compression and the creation of a Windows Installer (.msi) file are automatic for all packages and you can no longer override security descriptors.
segment.target: Compression and the creation of a Windows Installer (.msi) file are automatic for all packages and you can no longer override security descriptors.

segment.source: Tools / Options
segment.target: Tools / Options

segment.source: The Diagnostics window has been removed as well as several other settings.
segment.target: The Diagnostics window has been removed as well as several other settings.

segment.source: Installation Drive
segment.target: Installation Drive

segment.source: An installation drive is no longer required when you install an application.
segment.target: An installation drive is no longer required when you install an application.

segment.source: OOS Streaming
segment.target: OOS Streaming

segment.source: If no stream optimization is performed, packages are stream faulted when they are requested by computers running the App-V 5.0 client until they can launch.
segment.target: If no stream optimization is performed, packages are stream faulted when they are requested by computers running the App-V 5.0 client until they can launch.

segment.source: App-V 5.0 uses the native file system and no longer requires a Q:
segment.target: App-V 5.0 uses the native file system and no longer requires a Q:

segment.source: Sequencing error detection
segment.target: Sequencing error detection

segment.source: The App-V 5.0 sequencer can detect common sequencing issues during sequencing.
segment.target: The App-V 5.0 sequencer can detect common sequencing issues during sequencing.

segment.source: The Installation Report page at the end of the sequencing wizard displays diagnostic messages categorized into Errors, Warnings, and Info depending on the severity of the issue.
segment.target: The Installation Report page at the end of the sequencing wizard displays diagnostic messages categorized into Errors, Warnings, and Info depending on the severity of the issue.

segment.source: To display more detailed information about an event, double-click the item you want to review in the report.
segment.target: To display more detailed information about an event, double-click the item you want to review in the report.

segment.source: The sequencing issues, as well as suggestions about how to resolve the issues are displayed.
segment.target: The sequencing issues, as well as suggestions about how to resolve the issues are displayed.

segment.source: Information from the system preparation report and the installation report are summarized when you have finished creating a package.
segment.target: Information from the system preparation report and the installation report are summarized when you have finished creating a package.

segment.source: The following list displays the types of issues available in the report:
segment.target: The following list displays the types of issues available in the report:

segment.source: Excluded files.
segment.target: Excluded files.

segment.source: Driver information.
segment.target: Driver information.

segment.source: COM+ system differences.
segment.target: COM+ system differences.

segment.source: Side-by-side (SxS) conflicts.
segment.target: Side-by-side (SxS) conflicts.

segment.source: Shell Extensions.
segment.target: Shell Extensions.

segment.source: Information about unsupported services.
segment.target: Information about unsupported services.

segment.source: DCOM.
segment.target: DCOM.

segment.source: Connection Groups
segment.target: Connection Groups

segment.source: The App-V feature formerly known as Dynamic Suite Composition is now referred to as Connection Groups in App-V 5.0.
segment.target: The App-V feature formerly known as Dynamic Suite Composition is now referred to as Connection Groups in App-V 5.0.

segment.source: For more information about using Connection Groups see Managing Connection Groups.
segment.target: For more information about using Connection Groups see Managing Connection Groups.

segment.source: Licensing and Metering Functionality
segment.target: Licensing and Metering Functionality

segment.source: The application and licensing functionality has been removed in App-V 5.0.
segment.target: The application and licensing functionality has been removed in App-V 5.0.

segment.source: The actual license positions in your environment depend on the specific software title license and usage rights granted by the associated license terms.
segment.target: The actual license positions in your environment depend on the specific software title license and usage rights granted by the associated license terms.

segment.source: File and Application Cache
segment.target: File and Application Cache

segment.source: There is no file or application cache available with App-V 5.0.
segment.target: There is no file or application cache available with App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for App-V?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For App-V issues, use the App-V TechNet Forum.

segment.target: Related topics
